Question
========
Which list matches the three main components of a Quarto document?

Answerlist
----------
* Markdown text, CSS styling, and images
* YAML front matter, Markdown text, and executable code chunks
* CSV data, HTML templates, and JSON metadata
* Title page, bibliography, and appendix

Solution
========
A Quarto document is made of YAML front matter, Markdown text, and optional executable code chunks.

Answerlist
----------
* False
* True
* False
* False
